effect_entries.effect:
Used by trainer outside of battle
:   Searches for hidden items.
effect_entries.short_effect: Use to find hidden items on the field. AKA Itemfinder.

flavor_text_entries.text:
みえない　道具に　反応して
音と　光で　教えてくれる
最新の　機械。

It searches for hidden items in the
area and emits different lights and
sounds when it detects something.

Dispositivo ultramoderno che indica la direzione
in cui si trovano gli strumenti invisibili
emettendo dei suoni.

Bonguri de color blanco que no desprende aroma
alguno.

Scannt die Umgebung nach unsichtbaren Items.
Es blinkt und piept, sobald es etwas findet.

Un appareil high-tech qui indique l’emplacement
des objets invisibles en émettant un son et en
clignotant.

보이지 않는 도구에 반응해서
소리와 빛으로 가르쳐주는
최신 기계.

みえない　どうぐに　はんのうして
おとと　ひかりで　おしえてくれる
さいしんの　きかい。

It checks for unseen items in the area
and makes noise and lights when it
finds something.

It checks for unseen items in the area
and makes noise and lights when it
finds something.

Un appareil high-tech qui indique
l’emplacement des objets invisibles
en émettant un son et en clignotant.

It checks for unseen items in the area
and makes noise and lights when it
finds something.

A device used for finding items.
If there is a hidden item nearby
when it is used, it emits a signal.

A device that
signals an invisible
item by sound.

A device that
signals an invisible
item by sound.
